traversal.speaker: Player
traversal.text: Text is too faded. Doesn't tell me who was worshipped here.
traversal.context: NodeContext: Players with religious classes comment on the plaque.

traversal.speaker: Narrator
traversal.text: *Here lies the Guardian of Tombs. Through knowledge comes atonement.*
traversal.context: NodeContext: Reading the inscription on a sarcophagus.

traversal.speaker: Narrator
traversal.text: *Here lies the Guardian of Tombs. Through knowledge comes atonement.*
traversal.context: NodeContext: Reading the inscription on a sarcophagus.

traversal.speaker: Player
traversal.text: A dead language? Something ancient must have been worshipped here.
